name: Final Fantasy VII Remake Deluxe Edition
description: Completely rebuilt from the ground up with brand new graphics and gameplay, revisit the world of Final Fantasy VII with this Deluxe Edition.
features: Deluxe Edition includes art book, mini-soundtrack CD, and exclusive SteelBook case

name: Demon Slayer Nezuko Kamado Figure
description: High-quality PVC figure of Nezuko Kamado from Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba. Stands approximately 8 inches tall.

name: Nintendo Switch Animal Crossing Edition
description: Special edition Nintendo Switch console featuring Animal Crossing: New Horizons-inspired design. Console only, games sold separately.
features: Uniquely designed dock featuring Tom Nook and Nooklings

name: Pokémon Legends: Arceus
description: Explore the ancient Hisui region in this action-RPG entry in the Pokémon series for Nintendo Switch.
features: Set in the ancient past of the Sinnoh region

name: One Piece Collectible Card Game Starter Deck
description: Start your adventure in the One Piece Card Game with this ready-to-play starter deck featuring Luffy and the Straw Hat Pirates.
features: 5 exclusive cards not found in booster packs
Compatible with all One Piece CCG expansions

name: Studio Ghibli My Neighbor Totoro Plush - Large
description: Official Studio Ghibli large Totoro plush. Super soft and huggable, perfect for fans of all ages.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Collector's Edition
description: Relive the story of Goku in this action-RPG Dragon Ball game with exclusive collector's edition content.

name: Attack on Titan 3D Maneuver Gear Replica
description: High-quality replica of the 3D Maneuver Gear from Attack on Titan. Perfect for cosplay or display.

name: Japanese Traditional Tea Set
description: Authentic Japanese ceramic tea set including teapot, four cups, and bamboo whisk for preparing matcha.
features: Traditional design with cherry blossom motif
Complete set for Japanese tea ceremony

name: Persona 5 Royal - Phantom Thieves Edition
description: Definitive edition of Persona 5 with new content, characters, and this special Phantom Thieves collector's edition.

name: Evangelion Unit-01 Model Kit
description: High-grade model kit of Evangelion Unit-01 from Neon Genesis Evangelion. Highly articulated with multiple accessories.

name: Japanese Modern Cookbook
description: Comprehensive cookbook featuring modern Japanese cuisine with easy-to-follow recipes adapted for international kitchens.

name: Gundam Perfect Grade RX-78-2
description: Perfect Grade 1/60 scale model kit of the classic RX-78-2 Gundam. The ultimate expression of Gunpla engineering.
features: Full inner frame with exceptional articulation

name: Pokémon TCG Japanese Booster Box
description: Japanese edition Pokémon Trading Card Game booster box. Contains 30 packs with exclusive cards not yet available internationally.
features: Higher pull rates for rare cards

name: Street Fighter 6 Arcade Stick
description: Professional-grade arcade stick for Street Fighter 6 and other fighting games. Features authentic Japanese arcade parts.
